main event: An object larger than a star, with red lights, hovered briefly and did not disappear, as observed by ground radar on November 21, 1957 in St. Louis, Missouri.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than any star, with red lights.
The object hovered briefly and did not disappear.
The sighting was observed by ground radar.
An ASTRO PLOT showed the object to be a known location given the time of sighting.
There were no photographs available in the report.
sighted object: An object larger than a star, with red lights
